title: I have an amazing idea to completely turn minion based game play on its head
body:
Ok, check this out, Haunt and I came up with  a really good idea.

So, you know how like, farming is super hard cuz minions always taking your minions kills.  Well thats pretty stupid because like, the minions don't get gold for that, so why are they always taking your farm?? Check this.  So for every minion killed by your minions, all the gold goes into..i dunno..like a bucket.  Okay?  Now.  The team captain can use that bucket gold to upgrade the team's minions and structures.  This is pretty cool, because even if someone who missed a farm every now and then like myself, can still contribute to the team victory.  Anyway, this is a really good idea and I'd appreciate positive feedback only.  Thank you very much!
